00045 void GWindowGLX::setDimensions(unsigned int nwidth, unsigned int nheight)
00046 {
00047 
00048     //If there is no display exit out
00049     if (disp == 0) return;
00050 
00051     XResizeWindow(disp, win, nwidth, nheight);
00052 
00053     width = nwidth;
00054     height = nheight;
00055 
00056 }

00058 void GWindowGLX::setTitle(const char* Title)
00059 {
00060 
00061     //If there is no display exit out
00062     if (disp == 0) return;
00063 
00064     XSetStandardProperties(disp, win, Title, Title, None, 0, 0, NULL);
00065 
00066 }
00067 
00068 void GWindowGLX::destroy()
00069 {
00070 
00071     //If theres no display theres nothing to free
00072     if (disp == 0) return;
00073 
00074     printf("Destroying window\n");
00075 
00076 
00077     glXMakeCurrent(disp, 0, 0);
00078     glXDestroyContext(disp, ctx);
00079 
00080 
00081     XDestroyWindow(disp, win);
00082     XFreeColormap(disp, cmap);
00083     XCloseDisplay(disp);
00084 
00085     m_boundRenderer = 0;
00086     disp = 0;
00087 
00088     memset(&win, 0, sizeof(Window));
00089     memset(&ctx, 0, sizeof(GLXContext));
00090     memset(&cmap, 0, sizeof(Colormap));
00091 
00092     printf("Display closed all nulled\n");
00093 
00094 }

00096 bool GWindowGLX::create(const char * Title, int W, int H, GRenderer* Render)
00097 {
00098     printf("GLX window initialized\n");
00099 
00100     m_InputPostbox = 0;
00101     int dummy = 0;
00102 
00103     m_boundRenderer = Render;
00104 
00105     printf("Creating GLX window\n");
00106 
00107     disp = XOpenDisplay(NULL);
00108 
00109     if (disp == NULL)
00110     {
00111 
00112         printf("Unable to open display\n");
00113 
00114         return false;
00115 
00116     }
00117 
00118     if(!glXQueryExtension(disp, &dummy, &dummy))
00119     {
00120 
00121         printf("GLX not supported\n");
00122 
00123         return false;
00124     }
00125 
00126     vi = glXChooseVisual(disp, DefaultScreen(disp), attrList);
00127 
00128     if (vi == NULL)
00129     {
00130 
00131         printf("Unable to choose double buffered RGB visual\n");
00132         return false;
00133 
00134     }
00135 
00136     ctx = glXCreateContext(disp, vi, /* no shared dlists */ None,
00137                            /* direct rendering if possible */ GL_TRUE);
00138 
00139     if (ctx == NULL)
00140     {
00141 
00142         printf("Unable to get a OpenGL context\n");
00143 
00144         return false;
00145 
00146     }
00147 
00148     /* create an X colormap since probably not using default visual */
00149     cmap = XCreateColormap(disp, RootWindow(disp, vi->screen), vi->visual, AllocNone);
00150 
00151     attr.colormap = cmap;
00152     attr.border_pixel = 0;
00153     attr.event_mask = KeyPressMask | KeyReleaseMask | PointerMotionMask | ExposureMask
00154                       | ButtonPressMask | ButtonReleaseMask | StructureNotifyMask | ResizeRequest;
00155 
00156     win = XCreateWindow(disp, RootWindow(disp, vi->screen), 0, 0,
00157                         W, H, 0, vi->depth, InputOutput, vi->visual,
00158                         CWBorderPixel | CWColormap | CWEventMask, &attr);
00159 
00160     XSetStandardProperties(disp, win, Title, Title, None,
00161                            0, 0, NULL);
00162 
00163     Atom wmDelete=XInternAtom(disp, "WM_DELETE_WINDOW", True);
00164     XSetWMProtocols(disp, win, &wmDelete, 1);
00165 
00166 //Uncomment to make the cursor go away
00167     /*
00168         Pixmap bm_no;
00169 
00170         Cursor no_ptr;
00171         XColor black, dummyclr;
00172         static char bm_no_data[] = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0};
00173 
00174         if (disp == 0) return false;
00175 
00176         cmap = DefaultColormap(disp, DefaultScreen(disp));
00177         XAllocNamedColor(disp, cmap, "black", &black, &dummyclr);
00178         bm_no = XCreateBitmapFromData(disp, win, bm_no_data, 8, 8);
00179         no_ptr = XCreatePixmapCursor(disp, bm_no, bm_no, &black, &black, 0, 0);
00180 
00181         XDefineCursor(disp, win, no_ptr);
00182         XFreeCursor(disp, no_ptr);
00183 
00184         if (bm_no != None)
00185         {
00186                 XFreePixmap(disp, bm_no);
00187                 XFreeColors(disp, cmap, &black.pixel, 1, 0);
00188         } */
00189 
00190     /*** (6) bind the rendering context to the window ***/
00191 
00192     glXMakeCurrent(disp, win, ctx);
00193 
00194     /*** (7) request the X window to be displayed on the screen ***/
00195 
00196     XMapWindow(disp, win);
00197 
00198     width = W;
00199     height = H;
00200 
00201     printf("Done\n");
00202 
00203     return true;
00204 }

00206 Input_Event keyEvent_ASCI(int itype, int ASCIVal)
00207 {
00208     Input_Event Event;
00209     Event.Event_ID = itype;
00210 
00211     if (ASCIVal > 64 && ASCIVal < 91)
00212     {
00213         Event.Event_Flags = 0 | KEY_UPPERCASE;
00214     }
00215     else
00216     {
00217         Event.Event_Flags = 0;
00218     }
00219 
00220     switch (ASCIVal)
00221     {
00222     case ' ':
00223     {
00224         Event.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_SPACE);
00225         break;
00226     }
00227     case 'a':
00228     case 'A':
00229     {
00230         Event.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_A);
00231         break;
00232     }
00233     case 'b':
00234     case 'B':
00235     {
00236         Event.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_B);
00237         break;
00238     }
00239     case 'c':
00240     case 'C':
00241     {
00242         Event.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_C);
00243         break;
00244     }
00245     case 'd':
00246     case 'D':
00247     {
00248         Event.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_D);
00249         break;
00250     }
00251     case 'e':
00252     case 'E':
00253     {
00254         Event.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_E);
00255         break;
00256     }
00257     case 'f':
00258     case 'F':
00259     {
00260         Event.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_F);
00261         break;
00262     }
00263     case 'g':
00264     case 'G':
00265     {
00266         Event.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_G);
00267         break;
00268     }
00269     case 'h':
00270     case 'H':
00271     {
00272         Event.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_H);
00273         break;
00274     }

00276     case 'I':

00279         break;
00280     }

00402         Event.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_4);
00403         break;
00404     }
00405     case '5':
00406     {
00407         Event.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_5);
00408         break;
00409     }
00410     case '6':
00411     {
00412         Event.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_6);
00413         break;
00414     }
00415     case '7':
00416     {
00417         Event.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_7);
00418         break;
00419     }
00420     case '8':
00421     {
00422         Event.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_8);
00423         break;
00424     }
00425     case '9':
00426     {
00427         Event.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_9);
00428         break;
00429     }
00430     case '0':
00431     {
00432         Event.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_0);
00433         break;
00434     }
00435 
00436     case '\r':
00437     {
00438         Event.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_RETURN);
00439         break;
00440     }
00441     case '\b':
00442     {
00443         Event.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_BACKSPACE);
00444         break;
00445     }
00446 
00447     default:
00448     {
00449         Event.Event_ID = -1;
00450     }
00451 
00452     }
00453 
00454     return Event;
00455 }

00460 void GWindowGLX::update()
00461 {
00462     XEvent               event;
00463     char text[255];
00464     KeySym key;
00465 
00466     if (XPending(disp))
00467     {
00468 
00469         do
00470         {
00471             XNextEvent(disp, &event);
00472 
00473             switch (event.type)
00474             {
00475 
00476                 case ClientMessage:
00477                 {
00478                     printf("Window destroyed\n");
00479 
00480                     Input_Event newEvent;
00481                     newEvent.Event_ID = input_event_window;
00482                     newEvent.Event_Data.push_back(WINDOW_KILL_REQUEST);
00483 
00484                     GWindowGLX::m_InputPostbox->AddQueue(newEvent);
00485 
00486                     break;
00487                 };
00488 
00489                 case KeyPress:
00490                 {
00491                     if (XLookupString(&event.xkey,text,255,&key,0) == 1)
00492                     {
00493                         Input_Event E = keyEvent_ASCI(input_event_keyreleased, text[0]);
00494 
00495                         if (E.Event_ID != -1)
00496                         {
00497                             sKeyDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = false;
00498 
00499                             if (KeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] == false)
00500                             {
00501 
00502                                 KeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = true;
00503 
00504                                 Input_Event E = keyEvent_ASCI(input_event_keypressed, text[0]);
00505 
00506                                 if (E.Event_ID != -1)
00507                                 {
00508                                     if (m_InputPostbox)
00509                                         GWindowGLX::m_InputPostbox->AddQueue(E);
00510                                 }
00511 
00512                             }
00513                         }
00514                     }
00515 
00516                     break;
00517                 }
00518 
00519                 case KeyRelease:
00520                 {
00521                     if (XLookupString(&event.xkey,text,255,&key,0) == 1)
00522                     {
00523                         Input_Event E = keyEvent_ASCI(input_event_keyreleased, text[0]);
00524 
00525                         if (E.Event_ID != -1)
00526                             sKeyDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = true;
00527                     }
00528 
00529                     break;
00530                 }
00531 
00532                 case ButtonPress:
00533                 {
00534 
00535                     std::vector<int> Data;
00536                     Data.push_back(MOUSE_DOWN);
00537                     Data.push_back(event.xbutton.x);
00538                     Data.push_back(event.xbutton.y);
00539 
00540                     Input_Event E;
00541                     E.Event_ID = input_event_button_one;
00542                     E.Event_Data = Data;
00543                     E.Event_Flags = 0;
00544 
00545                     if (m_InputPostbox)
00546                         GWindowGLX::m_InputPostbox->AddQueue(E);
00547 
00548                     break;
00549                 }
00550 
00551                 case ButtonRelease:
00552                 {
00553                     std::vector<int> Data;
00554                     Data.push_back(MOUSE_UP);
00555                     Data.push_back(event.xbutton.x);
00556                     Data.push_back(event.xbutton.y);
00557 
00558                     Input_Event E;
00559                     E.Event_ID = input_event_button_one;
00560                     E.Event_Data = Data;
00561                     E.Event_Flags = 0;
00562 
00563                     if (m_InputPostbox)
00564                         GWindowGLX::m_InputPostbox->AddQueue(E);
00565 
00566                     break;
00567                 }
00568 
00569                 case ConfigureNotify:
00570                 {
00571                     //resize(event.xconfigure.width, event.xconfigure.height);
00572 
00573                     /*
00574 
00575                     if (m_boundRenderer != 0)
00576                     {
00577                         m_boundRenderer->getGraphicsAPI()->haresizeViewport(0, 0, event.xconfigure.width, event.xconfigure.height);
00578                     }
00579 
00580                     */
00581 
00582                     width = event.xconfigure.width;
00583                     height = event.xconfigure.height;
00584 
00585                     break;
00586                 }
00587 
00588                 case MotionNotify:
00589                 {
00590                     std::vector<int> Data;
00591 
00592                     Data.push_back(MOUSE_MOTION);
00593                     Data.push_back(event.xbutton.x);
00594                     Data.push_back(event.xbutton.y);
00595 
00596                     Input_Event E;
00597                     E.Event_ID = input_event_button_one;
00598                     E.Event_Data = Data;
00599                     E.Event_Flags = 0;
00600 
00601                     if (m_InputPostbox)
00602                         GWindowGLX::m_InputPostbox->AddQueue(E);
00603 
00604                     break;
00605                 }
00606             }
00607         }
00608         while(XPending(disp));   /* loop to compress events */
00609 
00610     }
00611 
00612     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 256; i++)
00613     {
00614         if (sKeyDown[i] == true)
00615         {
00616             Input_Event E;
00617             E.Event_ID = input_event_keyreleased;
00618             E.Event_Data.push_back(i);
00619 
00620             if (m_InputPostbox)
00621                 GWindowGLX::m_InputPostbox->AddQueue(E);
00622 
00623             sKeyDown[i] = false;
00624             KeysDown[i] = false;
00625         }
00626     }
00627 
00628     return;
00629 }

00631 void GWindowGLX::finalFrame()
00632 {
00633     glXSwapBuffers(disp, win);
00634 }
